title: 俄罗斯的中国耕种者
content:
译者 candy姓张叫嘴

A lot of Chinese people have moved to Russia and began cultivating the land. And the Chinese do there what Russians don’t like to do – they work.

The Chelyabinsk Region also has a big population of Chinese people who’ve built there thousands of greenhouses. The fact that they gather in the crops three times a year makes some of the locals think that they use chemicals and pollute the environment. They also grumble that the Chinese do not pay taxes. Others, however, agree that the Chinese do good for the region because they cultivate the land residents of Chelyabinsk don’t want to.

很多中国人跑去俄罗斯去开垦异国的土地，他们在那儿做一些俄罗斯人不愿意做的事情，那就是工作。车里雅宾斯克地区也有很大一部分中国人盖起了上千座大棚，每年三季谷物都有收成，这让当地人怀疑他们使用了农药，因此污染了环境。有人抱怨中国农民在俄罗斯并不纳税，但也有人对中国农民的耕种表示赞赏，毕竟这些活儿都是车里雅宾斯克本地人并不愿意干的。

Greenhouses. Some of the cellophane has been removed.

一排排的大棚，有些上面的塑料膜被揭去

Seeing this many greenhouses around is very unusual for a Russian person.

俄罗斯人并不习惯看到着一片片的大棚

Pipes sticking out of the greenhouses.

They plan to begin farming in December so they’re going to need heating.

管子从大棚里伸出来。他们计划在12月开始耕种，所以需要供暖。

The distance between the greenhouses is less than one meter, so all of them look like a large cellophane carpet.

没座大棚之间的距离不超过一米，所以它们看起来就像一大块塑料布。

Entrances to the greenhouses are barricaded. The point is that envious locals wanted to destroy the prosperous plantations but the administration of the region prohibited them from doing that.

总是有当地人想要对这块种植地进行破坏，而片区的管理者自然不同意他们这么做，所以他们用木头封住了去往大棚区的入口。

With their old cellophane they cover firewood to heat the stove in winter.

冬天，他们通过将柴火和旧的塑料膜共同燃烧为大棚供暖。

The Chinese avoid talking to strangers.

当地的中国人避免和陌生人聊天，可能因为他们害怕遭到检查。

Probably, they’re afraid of inspections…

None of them speaks Russian. It’s the best protection, by the way.

没人会说俄语，但这或许是最好的保护方式了。

In most cases they are friendly and peaceable.

大部分情况下他们都很友好。

This is where they live.

当地中国人居住的房子。

This is a satellite dish.

房顶上圆圆的是卫星信号接收器。

A dining room. Here they eat rice for breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

饭堂。他们在这里用餐，一天三顿全是米饭。

Here they sleep. They don’t put their working clothes off before going to sleep…

卧“室”。直到夜深他们才会脱去工服入睡。

Boxes for vegetables.

用来装蔬菜的纸箱。

They don’t have a lot of farm machinery…

他们并没有太多农用机械

This year the 2500 Chinese people farming in the Chelyabinsk region, produced over 80 thousand tons of greenhouse vegetables!

今年2500名耕种在车里雅宾斯克地区的中国农民收获了8万多吨的大棚蔬菜。

Very soon they’ll be growing tomatoes, cucumbers and cabbage here.

很快这里就会长出西红柿、黄瓜和卷心菜。

One of the disadvantages of their farming is the fact they have to cut trees, because they need a lot of wood to build greenhouses.

他们必须砍树才能盖大棚，这也是耕种的不利条件之一。

A guard.

保安。

A worker.

工作人员。

At first the Chinese sold their products at a very low price but after visits of some inspections, they had to increase their prices by several times.

起初中国人都是低价销售自己的种的瓜果蔬菜，但是检验人员来了几次之后，他们就不得不多次提高菜价。

Some say that the Chinese are kept there as slaves and had to wash themselves with water from puddles…

有人说中国人到这里之后就成了奴隶，而且不得不用泥水沟里的水洗澡。

The Chinese try not to run across the locals and stay within their farms.

中国人尽量避免碰到当地人，也尽量不去他们本地的农田。

In the Chelyabinsk Region there are over 5000 greenhouses and each of them brings to its owner over 6 million rubles (200 thousand dollars) a month.

在车里雅宾斯克地区有5000多个大棚，每个每月能带来600万卢布（20万美元）的收益。

A local elderly lady. Her only complaint about the Chinese is the fact that they cut trees and pollute the river.

当地一位年长的妇女说，她对中国人的唯一的不满就是他们砍伐树木、污染河流。
